item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Dow Industrials jumped nearly 600 points Monday, wiping its loss from Friday's sell-off. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Tuesday.

item.title: Where Morningstar's 2025 bond manager of the year sees the best opportunities right now
item.description: Artisan Partners' Bryan Krug was recently named outstanding fixed-income portfolio manager by Morningstar. Where he is investing now.

item.title: High-quality, low-volatility stocks to consider if market turmoil upends the next two months
item.description: High-quality stocks that are less volatile include Berkshire Hathaway, C.H. Robinson and CVS Health.

item.title: The charts show Tesla shares could be on the verge of a big swing, Katie Stockton says
item.description: Chart analyst Katie Stockton of Fairlead Strategies breaks down the technical backdrop in Tesla shares.

item.title: Insider report: The stocks with the biggest recent sales by executives include United Airlines, Charles Schwab and NXP Semiconductors
item.description: Investors may follow moves by company executives or officers to gauge what may be happening within the businesses.
